title: Nanette Lepore typeface
content:
[www.nanettelepore.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118054058/http:/www.nanettelepore.com/ "www.nanettelepore.com")

it looks similar to bodoni and filosofia but not quite them. does anyone know this typeface?
author: KJB

comments.content:
The menu typeface is [Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118054058/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/alternate_cuts.html). The wordmark is [Antique Roman Solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118054058/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/antique_roman_std_solid/&sample_text=nanette%20lepore&sample_size=74) (similar to [Antique Roman _Sackers_ Solid](http://web.archive.org/web/20140118054058/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/antique_roman_std_sackers_solid/&sample_text=nanette%20lepore&sample_size=74).  
F

Ah, flatness everywhere!

Guerrizmo+Design  
No man is an island unto himself\_John Donne
